snippet: Senator John McCain of Arizona suggested in an interview posted on Friday that a super PAC backing Republican candidate Mitt Romney may have provided a conduit for foreign money to enter the presidential race.
abstract: Senator John McCain of Arizona suggested in an interview posted on Friday that a super PAC backing Republican candidate Mitt Romney may have provided a conduit for foreign money to enter the presidential race.

headline.main: McCain Says Adelson is Putting 'Foreign Money' Into Campaign
headline.print_headline: Seeing Door for Foreign Cash in Election

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
